idea: A platform that allows investors to access alternative Alpha
name: ALPHI TECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: In recent years, the government has encouraged the production of renewable ethanol from a variety of feedstock. By the upcoming years, the government hopes to have a mandate for ethanol blends in gasoline of at least 20 per cent. Many favourable policies and incentives have been put in place to help with this endeavour. As a result of a policy shift, the government now permits the production of ethanol directly from FCI grain.
name: NEWALT ENERGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Increasing process efficiency is of strategic importance to any business. Specially, in the post pandemic world, the need for technology adoption has been felt strongly by all organizations. While large corporates can afford to take services of big IT firms, the same is not true for small and mid-sized companies. Also ,large IT companies usually have standard solutions. Customization is costly and time-consuming. This is causing a digital gap between large and mid sized companies.

In this scenario, how can small and mid-sized companies reap the benefit of technology adoption? They have smaller needs, less budget and limited technical know-how. But the need for process automation, data analytics, risk management and other services are there for all organizations.

Our startup Igniatek aims to solve this problem by democratizing automation and other tech solutions. We bring the apparently complex world of “automation” to the realm of common folks in easy, cost-effective way. It can be adopted by even those small or mid-sized companies which can not afford to have dedicated IT department. The problem areas and solutions are modularized based on industry and function. Hence any client can choose exactly the portion they want to implement. This reduces redundancy and offer better value for money to the clients.
name: IGNIATEK CONSULTANCY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: STATIONERY PRINTING TONER CARTRIDGE HOUSEKEEPING MATERIAL CORPORATE SUPPLIER
name: APPLE STATIONERY AND XEROX

idea: ULTEUM PHARMA PRIVATE LIMITED is a pharmaceutical company registered under Companies Act, 2013. The company aims to manufacture life saving as well generic drugs.
name: ULTEUM PHARMA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Oceanergy was established in 2012 with a vision to be a leading service provider in Engineering Services organization in Oil and Gas Industry. We provide performance-driven solutions throughout the asset life cycle, from concept to decommissioning across a broad range of industrial markets, including the upstream, midstream and downstream oil & gas, power & process and clean energy sectors. Differentiated by the quality of our people and our relentless drive to deliver the most successful outcomes, we align our capabilities to our customers’ objectives to create a lasting positive impact. Through innovative technologies and improved efficiencies, our offer unlocks new possibilities for our clients in developing their oil and gas resources. Each of our employees is driven by a commitment to clients and a culture of purposeful innovation, challenging industry conventions, and rethinking how the best results are achieved.
name: OFFSHORE ENGINEERING DESIGN AND ENERGY CONSULTANTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
"Grofame Productions" is an India-based company specialized in high-quality content creation, production, 3D, 2D & Visual effects animation services, and

other emerging technologies founded by experienced professional artists. Grofame believes in going that extra mile to 'Entertain Family and Kids'

As an independent animation production company "Grofame Productions" is willing to produce and co-produce all kinds of CGI films, TV series, Commercials, and

Motion Picture Films. We are dedicated to producing a diverse range of quality entertainment for today's marketplace and to collaborating with like-minded partners to producing

great stories on the screen. We are pleased to introduce ourselves as an emerging specialist in the field of Animation services.
name: GROFAME PRODUCTIONS

idea: Food Processing and Marketing company mainly focusing on chemical free and natural processing of Chikoo (Sapota), Mango, Banana, Star Fruit and other Vegetables and Herbs
name: Ruwan Foodtech LLP

idea: Medical on wheels is a concept of door to door medicine delivery platform added with other advantages. There will be two user interfaces, one for doctors and one for customer. Doctors don’t need to give a prescription to the patients when they consult a patient. Instead, doctors will have an option for digital prescription which will be forwarded to customers MOW(medical on wheels) account. At the same time, it will be forwarded to us as well. When we receive the digital prescription, immediately customer will get a call from us, we’ll inform the cost of the medicine and take customers approval. We’ll digitally verify medicine with doctors so that patients don’t have to visit the Epcot or again. Our representative will keep in touch with customers for their future and to check up on their health.
name: Medical on wheels

idea:
Digitrix Edutech Private Limited is a Private Limited Company incorporated on September 10, 2021. Digitrix is a leading provider of cutting-edge technologies and services, offering scalable solutions for companies of all sizes. Founded by a group of friends who started by scribbling their ideas on a piece of paper, today the Company offer smart, innovative services to dozens of clients worldwide.

The Company built their solutions by closely listening to the potential clientele and understanding their expectations with the product. The team knows how to analyze that information and customize the offering to changing market needs.

The Company is launching an innovative educational technology product “Little Cubbie” to develop skills in 3 to 7 years old children. This is a “Make in India” initiative for starting figurine toy and electronic speaker box manufacturing locally as against almost entirely Chinese imports being sold in the global and Indian markets today. The project is being fully designed, developed and manufactured to produce a world class kids skill development system but in keeping with the government’s “Vocal for Local” initiative. The system is envisaged keeping in mind the peculiarities of Indian culture and education system. Importantly this project will also generate employment for large numbers of skilled and unskilled work force.

The company is readying to introduce a revolutionary method of imparting important mental and life skills to 3 to 7 years old kids required for improving their performance in schools and in life in general. A continuous series of themed toys will be launched starting early 2022 under the brand name “Little Cubbie”.
name: DIGITRIX EDUTECH PRIVATE LIMITED
